reviewText: A real feel of how a horse is in his natural state with his herd. Great feel good factor
I teach a class on horse behavior and training and this video is the best I've found to show the natural behavior of horses.

Do not by this DVD if you wish to learn real training techniques.  This guy is a Jane Goodall-esque crackpot.  If your looking for practical instruction on understanding your horse/es and desire to develop better training techniques I highly recommend Clinton Anderson from Australia.  Much more grounded and practical.
This DVD is done in a highly artistic matter with lots of puff and fluff.  If you ask me this author does not live in the real world.
If you want to learn about horses this is the best horse movie ever. No Hollywood BS or Horse Whispering nonsense. Real science and a true work of art at the same time.
This ia a real learning experience on how horses comunicate.  It should be required viewing for all horse owners.
